title: Executive Order 5861-Authorizing the Appointment of Eugene R. Capozio
content: Eugene R. Capozio may be appointed to the position of clerk at $1,260 per annum in the Veterans' Administration without reference to the requirements of the civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5861-Authorizing the Appointment of Eugene R. Capozio Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361455
